summary: Web app UI polish: update front/landing page background to a lighter, professional look and add the user-provided photo to the About Our Practice section.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Cropped square portrait photo with neutral color balance and subtle contrast (ca-about-photo.dim_800x800.jpg)

## Edit Images
- Replace the About section placeholder image (ca-profile-placeholder.dim_800x800.png > ca-about-photo.dim_800x800.jpg)

existing_features.title: Update the image in the “About Our Practice” section (the at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1]) to use the user-uploaded photo instead of the current placeholder image, while keeping the existing aspect-square layout, rounded corners, border, and shadow styling.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the front/landing page background to a lighter, formal, professional style.
Add the user-provided photo to the About Our Practice section (use the newly uploaded image).

projectName: Replace About Our Practice image with the uploaded photo
